survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with On-Site Childcare Facilities Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction with on-site childcare facilities, including availability, quality, and convenience, to identify potential improvements.

questions.question_text: Do you currently use the on-site childcare facility?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Ensure this question is clear and straightforward to filter respondents who use the facility.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Do you currently use the on-site childcare facility?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of childcare slots?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q1 is 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels accurately.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of childcare slots?
script.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q1 is 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: What aspects of the childcare facility do you value the most? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q1 is 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse preferences.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.

script.question_text: What aspects of the childcare facility do you value the most? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q1 is 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the on-site childcare facility to a colleague?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q1 is 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: This question measures Net Promoter Score (NPS) for the childcare facility.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the on-site childcare facility to a colleague?
script.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q1 is 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-site childcare facility?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q1 is 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended responses can provide qualitative insights for improvement.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text box for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the on-site childcare facility?
script.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q1 is 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: If you do not use the on-site childcare facility, what is the primary reason?
answer_options: Not applicable (I do not have children)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q1 is 'No'.
questions.client_notes: This helps identify barriers to usage for non-users.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection with an 'Other' option and text field.

script.question_text: If you do not use the on-site childcare facility, what is the primary reason?
answer_options: Not applicable (I do not have children)
script.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q1 is 'No'.
